warnings.invoice: Batdongsan.com.vn will automatically issue electronic invoices based on customer information and send them to the invoice email.
warnings.accuracy: Please enter complete, accurate information and take responsibility for the information provided.

warnings.service: The service content displayed on the invoice is advertising service fees on the website batdongsan.com.vn.
warnings.support: For any issues requiring support regarding invoices for payment transactions during the day, please contact hotline 1900 1881 before 6 PM.

buyOrRent.title: List & search easily
buyOrRent.desc: Publish or find listings quickly with a streamlined workflow for both buying and renting.

rentals.title: Rich rental inventory
rentals.desc: Continuously updated rooms, serviced apartments and whole homes with transparent details.

projectReview.title: Objective project reviews
projectReview.desc: Expert insights help you evaluate amenities, growth potential and location value.

knowledge.title: AI Real Estate Assistant
knowledge.desc: AI delivers tips on safe renting, cost optimization, contract insights, feng shui guidance and fresh market trends.

searchIntro.title: Find your ideal place faster
searchIntro.description: Type a keyword or refine with filters for location, price, property type and amenities.

rentSecure.heading: Rent with confidence & transparency
rentSecure.sub: Verified listings, protected data and support if disputes arise.

smartSearch.heading: Smart search that fits you
smartSearch.sub: Granular filters and location-aware suggestions match budget & amenities.

aiAssist.heading: AI assistant for pricing & renting
aiAssist.sub: Instant answers on market value, contract clarity and cost optimization.
